category.name: Integration.TCAA
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: TCAA114_num_of_files_to_find_per_call
preference.preference_description: Through this option it is possible to limit the number of files to be searched by file name. If the number of files to be searched in a single operation exceeds the number specified in this option, multiple SOA calls will be performed. Searches by file name are typically executed in order to reconnect non-managed files to datasets already stored in Teamcenter (e.g. via TCAA COM API). Possible values: - 0 or any negative number: all the files involved in the operation are searched with a single SOA call. - Any positive number: this will be the maximum number of files searched by file name in a single SOA call. The default value is: 500.
